verses.text: \w When|strong="H5674"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w gone|strong="H5674"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w beyond|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w summit|strong="H7218"\w*, \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w there|strong="H2009"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w meet|strong="H7122"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w He|strong="H1732"\w* \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w pair|strong="H6776"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w saddled|strong="H2280"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* loaded \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H6776"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w clusters|strong="H6778"\w* \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w raisins|strong="H6778"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w hundred|strong="H3967"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruits|strong="H7019"\w*, \w and|strong="H3967"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* skin \w of|strong="H7218"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*.

“\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H5288"\w* \w these|strong="H1004"\w*?” \w asked|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* replied, “\w The|strong="H8354"\w* \w donkeys|strong="H2543"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w ride|strong="H7392"\w*, \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* \w fruit|strong="H7019"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w young|strong="H5288"\w* \w men|strong="H5288"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w eat|strong="H3899"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w wine|strong="H3196"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w to|strong="H4428"\w* refresh those \w who|strong="H5288"\w* become exhausted \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H8354"\w* \w wilderness|strong="H4057"\w*.”

“\w Where|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7725"\w* \w master|strong="H3427"\w*’s \w grandson|strong="H1121"\w*?” asked \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w* \w answered|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w Indeed|strong="H3588"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w* \w staying|strong="H3427"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* said, ‘\w Today|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w will|strong="H4428"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4468"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* grandfather.’”

\w So|strong="H4672"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*, “\w All|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* belongs \w to|strong="H4428"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* yours!” “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w humbly|strong="H7812"\w* \w bow|strong="H7812"\w* \w before|strong="H5869"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w*,” said \w Ziba|strong="H6717"\w*. “\w May|strong="H4428"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w find|strong="H4672"\w* \w favor|strong="H2580"\w* \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*!”

\w As|strong="H5704"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* approached Bahurim, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w from|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* just \w coming|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*. \w His|strong="H1732"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w was|strong="H8034"\w* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gera|strong="H1617"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w as|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* approached, \w he|strong="H5704"\w* kept yelling \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w curses|strong="H7043"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3605"\w* \w threw|strong="H5619"\w* \w stones|strong="H5619"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, though \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w troops|strong="H5971"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mighty|strong="H1368"\w* \w men|strong="H1368"\w* \w were|strong="H5971"\w* \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w left|strong="H8040"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1818"\w* \w as|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H3541"\w* yelled \w curses|strong="H7043"\w*, \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w*, “\w Get|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w get|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w you|strong="H3318"\w* \w worthless|strong="H1100"\w* man \w of|strong="H1818"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*!

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w paid|strong="H5414"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Saul|strong="H7586"\w*, \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w place|strong="H8478"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w kingdom|strong="H4410"\w* \w into|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* Absalom. \w See|strong="H2005"\w*, \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w ruin|strong="H7451"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*!”

\w Then|strong="H2088"\w* Abishai \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w* said \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w my|strong="H5493"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5674"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*? \w Let|strong="H4994"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w over|strong="H5674"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w cut|strong="H5493"\w* \w off|strong="H5493"\w* \w his|strong="H5493"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*!”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* replied, “\w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*? \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w curses|strong="H7043"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w told|strong="H6213"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, ‘\w Curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*,’ \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w can|strong="H4310"\w* \w ask|strong="H4428"\w*, ‘\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H3651"\w*?’”

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w said|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* Abishai \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, “\w Behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H5315"\w* flesh \w and|strong="H1121"\w* blood, \w seeks|strong="H1245"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w life|strong="H5315"\w*. \w How|strong="H3588"\w* \w much|strong="H3605"\w* \w more|strong="H3588"\w*, \w then|strong="H3318"\w*, \w this|strong="H6258"\w* \w Benjamite|strong="H1145"\w*! \w Leave|strong="H3240"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w alone|strong="H3240"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w let|strong="H6258"\w* \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w curse|strong="H7043"\w* \w me|strong="H5315"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* told \w him|strong="H3318"\w* \w so|strong="H3318"\w*.

Perhaps \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* affliction \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w repay|strong="H7725"\w* \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w for|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w cursing|strong="H7045"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* receive \w today|strong="H3117"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H1980"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* \w men|strong="H1980"\w* \w proceeded|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w road|strong="H1870"\w* \w as|strong="H1980"\w* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w along|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* ridge \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H1870"\w* \w hill|strong="H2022"\w* opposite \w him|strong="H1732"\w*. \w As|strong="H1980"\w* \w Shimei|strong="H8096"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w*, \w he|strong="H1732"\w* yelled \w curses|strong="H7043"\w*, \w threw|strong="H5619"\w* \w stones|strong="H5619"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* flung \w dust|strong="H6083"\w* \w at|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

Finally, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w with|strong="H5971"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* arrived, \w exhausted|strong="H5889"\w*. \w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w refreshed|strong="H5314"\w* \w himself|strong="H5314"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3605"\w* Absalom \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w came|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* Ahithophel \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H3389"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*’s \w friend|strong="H7463"\w* \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* Archite \w went|strong="H1732"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* Absalom \w and|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H1732"\w*, “Long \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*! Long \w live|strong="H2421"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*!”

“\w Is|strong="H2088"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w loyalty|strong="H2617"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* show \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*?” Absalom replied. “\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w did|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w friend|strong="H7453"\w*?”

“\w Not|strong="H3808"\w* \w at|strong="H3427"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w*,” \w Hushai|strong="H2365"\w* answered. “\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H2088"\w* chosen \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*—\w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w remain|strong="H3427"\w*.

Furthermore, \w whom|strong="H4310"\w* \w should|strong="H4310"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*? \w As|strong="H1961"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w served|strong="H5647"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w father|strong="H1121"\w*’s \w presence|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w also|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H3651"\w* \w will|strong="H4310"\w* \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* yours.”

\w Then|strong="H6213"\w* Absalom said \w to|strong="H6213"\w* Ahithophel, “\w Give|strong="H3051"\w* \w me|strong="H6213"\w* \w counsel|strong="H6098"\w*. \w What|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w*?”

Ahithophel replied, “Sleep \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w*, \w whom|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w left|strong="H3240"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w take|strong="H2388"\w* \w care|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w palace|strong="H1004"\w*. \w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w hears|strong="H8085"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* \w become|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* stench \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* father, \w then|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H3478"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w strengthened|strong="H2388"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w pitched|strong="H5186"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* tent \w for|strong="H5921"\w* Absalom \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w roof|strong="H1406"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* slept \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* father’s \w concubines|strong="H6370"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \w of|strong="H5869"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w in|strong="H3117"\w* \w those|strong="H1992"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w advice|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Ahithophel \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w like|strong="H3651"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w consultation|strong="H6098"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* God. \w Such|strong="H3651"\w* \w was|strong="H1732"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w regard|strong="H1697"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w both|strong="H1571"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* Absalom \w had|strong="H1732"\w* \w for|strong="H3117"\w* Ahithophel’s \w advice|strong="H6098"\w*.
